name: AdsInserter
author: e.nechehin

sections.changelog:
1.7

  • Fix warnings in options admin page

1.6

  • Fix adsinserter link in admin page
  • Fix warnings in options page

1.5

  • Fix – disable auto insert placement if not is_single

1.4

  • Add post categories to tags on post page (is_single)

1.3

  • Add filter ‘adsinserter-enabled’ for disabling all placements on page

1.2

  • Add settings page
  • Add in text placement insertion with custom density

1.1

  • Add widget for install placement from admin UI to widget area.

1.0

  • Initial release.
sections.description:
Manage your site placements from adsinserter.com dashboard.
Show placement units by filters: device type, referrer, url, tags and more.

Plugin:
* Connect client script and configure tags on your page.
* Add widget for install placement from admin UI to widget area
* Auto in text placement insertion with custom density

Features

  • Target units by:
    • Device type
    • Screen size
    • Url or referrer substring
    • Tags
    • Countries
  • Perfomance
    • Does not affect the performance of your server
    • Works with all types of caching and with all cache plugins
    • Lazyload option
  • Rorate units in placement
  • Starting and stopping units on schedule
  • Auto stop units after N views
  • Views statistics
  • Share access to the project and configure privileges
  • Change log

How to start

  1. Install and activate plugin on your wordpress site
  2. Sign in to adsinserter.com dashboard
  3. Create project for your site
  4. Create placement and insert code to your site where you want see ads or widgets
  5. Create unit in new placement with ads or widget code, configure settings and filters (if needed). Save unit

Documentation & Support

  • Docs
  • Feedback form
